about_the_game:
OVERVIEW:

In a world of magic with a harsh class divide, you are a pariah for not having any innate magic power. But after years of training your body, swordsmanship, and other physical skills, you are still able to defeat those with naturally strong magic. Find a way to break down the classist prejudices in this society, burn this rotten world to the ground then rebuild it from the ashes by surviving fast-paced melee combat with weapons, combining active and passive skills, and combos. Your honed skills over time will help you defeat those with innate magic and even formidable monsters, and through this, you will gradually approach the secret of the class divide in this magical world.

FEATURES

- Fast-paced sidescrolling platforming challenges with puzzles to explore the game world.
- Fast-paced third-person perspective combat with stylish combos and skills.
- Various weapons.
- Alternative Ending.
- Storytelling through comic-book pages.

STORY:

Elysianna Islands
The Elysianna Islands are a place where magic is considered the most valuable asset. The
social classes here are also defined based on the magical energy that people possess.
At the top of this place is a king who is chosen through a magic power competition held in
the capital of Elysium, when the incumbent king is about to die. The king of this island is
believed to have to carry out the orders of the Creator - The Lord, the one who bestows
power to the people of the island.
In addition to Elysium, there are also 5 other small islands ruled by the royal army and
headed by the Magic Generals with extremely high magical powers. Each of these islands
represents one of the five elements of the five elements: Gold (Ironheart), Wood
(Greenheart), Water (Mare), Fire (Igneus), Earth (Terra).
However, there is one island that is considered to be abandoned - Island 13th. At this place,
the people enjoy very little magical energy, the land is barren and they are always in a state
of hunger.

Light and Darkness, Rich and Poor, Physical and Magical
The focus of the story in "The Mage Slayer" is the confrontation between the protagonist
Zero and the final boss Alexandre de Lux.
Zero is a person who is at the bottom of society according to the beliefs of the people of
Elysianna. Being born on Island 13 is already a misfortune, but worse is that he does not
have a single bit of magic in him. In the battle with the royal guards to protect the people of
Island 13, he accidentally used his psychic ability and discovered that in a very distant place
(Elysium), there was an enemy who was considered his nemesis and that person was trying
to track him down. For what reason is unclear. This person is completely opposite to Zero,
he possesses a huge sudden source of magical energy and has the ultimate power in
Elysianna.
He must find him. One part is because he does not want to be chased to death, another part
is because he wants to vent his anger for more than twenty years. Why is The Lord so
unfair? Why is there a person who has everything while he has nothing?
Alexandre de Lux is completely the opposite. Born in silk and satin and carrying an
unmatched source of magical power. He can control all types of magical elements and even
create his own element. That is the reason why he was able to become King of Elysianna
from a very young age. However, The Lord is a fair god because the one who has nothing is
not without strengths and the one who has everything definitely also has at least one
weakness. The weakness of Alexandre de Lux is his weak physical condition. Due to the
body's lack of resistance, he is always in a state of thinness, weakness like a drug addict. He
wants to catch Zero because he also knows about his existence through a prophecy. That he
is a person with extremely good physical condition, a healthy body, never been sick. He
must catch him to truly become invincible.

The Fall of Elysianna
There is a prophecy that says that when the balance in Elysianna is lost. At that time, those
who are lucky enough to have a large source of magical energy will forget the existence of
The Lord, claim themselves to be gods, and stand above even gods. And of course, they will
no longer be able to communicate with spiritual entities (this is the reason that Zero has the
ability to telepathy). They will find a way to reverse the laws of nature and create many
painful destinies. The weak will become weaker, while the strong will become stronger. The
society of Elysianna will become increasingly corrupt, the magic that was previously used to
create good things will now create poisonous things.
When that happens, The Lord will send down a black storm to sweep away all that poison.
That's right! This storm sweeps away everything, leaving only ashes. Only then can He
rebuild it from scratch to make it a good place again.

content_descriptors.notes:
1. Characters Fighting Monsters:
In the game, players control various characters who engage in intense battles against a wide range of monsters. These combat encounters are integral to the gameplay, requiring strategic thinking and skillful execution to overcome the monstrous threats.

2. Storyline Featuring Incestuous Relationships:
The game's narrative explores complex and controversial themes, including the depiction of incestuous relationships. These elements are woven into the story to create a provocative and emotionally charged experience, challenging players to navigate the intricate dynamics between characters.

3. Class and Wealth Discrimination:
A significant aspect of the game's plot revolves around the stark disparities between different social classes. The storyline delves into the struggles of the impoverished as they clash with the wealthy elite, highlighting issues of inequality and social injustice within the game's world.

4. Drug Abuse:
The game does not shy away from portraying the harsh realities of substance abuse. Characters within the game may encounter or partake in drug use, reflecting the detrimental effects and the societal impact of addiction.
